name: Pan Gadgets
tag_list: gadgets, cheapest-gadgets, best, top-range, gift, ideas, toy-amp-games, home--lifestyle, christmas, rc-toys, travel-accessories, cool-gadgets
description: PanGadgets has cool gadgets and gifts
overview:
Pan Gadgets is an exciting new site which will offer its customers the very latest in innovative gadgets and gifts.

Our products are the creation of thousands of hours spent on the drawing board by creative individuals.

We aim to offer the coolest products around which can be ideal gifts to youngsters and adults alike. Whether you are a young child going through adolence or a 40 something year old going through a mid-life crisis, we have a variety of cool gadgets that will make you forget about the troubles of this world.

Pan Gadgets is the ultimate one stop gadget site.
